# Repositories

Here you can find the repository for the whole simulation and analysis: 

- <https://github.com/tati-micheletti/NWT/tree/development>

More specifically, these are the scripts used for the following:  

- **Simulations:** <https://github.com/tati-micheletti/NWT/blob/development/5_runningSimulations.R>
- **Umbrella analysis:** <https://github.com/tati-micheletti/NWT/blob/development/7_hotspotsAnalysis_V2.R>

The following modules were used for the predictions:  

- **Caribou predictions:** <https://github.com/tati-micheletti/caribouRSF_NT>
- **Landbird predictions:** <https://github.com/tati-micheletti/birdsNWT>
